description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Stockholm 2016
http://gotosthlm.com

Nicola Paolucci - Developer Advocate at Atlassian

ABSTRACT
Imagine a new kind of cluster. One which takes control of new machines on the fly, deploys all your services in the right order, links related applications together, balances [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotosthlm.com/2016/sessions/8
